attributes.action: confer a peerage to Prof. Stephen Hawking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Professor Stephen Hawking is an extraordinary human being.  I propose that Professor Stephen Hawking, one of the greatest minds this country has and has had, who should have been Knighted a decade ago should actually be conferred a peerage, and one that recognises his achievements.  Lord Hawking seems pretty reasonable to all the undersigned.
